statements.insert: insert into ASET_KEMITRAANDET(UNITKEY,NODOKUMEN,KDP3,KDTANS,ASETKEY,TAHUN,NOREG,IDBRG,KDSATWAKTU,JANGKAWAKTU,NILAI,NOPENILAIAN,[STATUS]) select #Unitkey#, #Nodokumen#, #Kdp3#, #Kdtans#, A.ASETKEY, A.TAHUN, A.NOREG, A.IDBRG, A.KDSATWAKTU, A.JANGKAWAKTU, A.NILAI , A.NOPENILAIAN, A.[STATUS] from ASET_KEMITRAANDET A left join ASET_KEMITRAAN AK ON AK.UNITKEY = A.UNITKEY AND AK.NODOKUMEN = A.NODOKUMEN AND AK.KDP3 = A.KDP3 AND AK.KDTANS = A.KDTANS where A.UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and A.KDTANS=#Kdtans# and AK.IDDOKUMEN = #Iddokumen# and AK.KDJENIS = '01' and AK.IDPENGAJUAN = 1
statements.update: update ASET_KEMITRAAN set TGLAWAL=#Tglawal#, TGLAKHIR=#Tglakhir#, KET=#Ket# where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Nodokumen# and KDP3=#Kdp3# and KDTANS=#Kdtans#
update ASET_KEMITRAAN set TGLVALID=#Tglvalid# where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Nodokumen# and KDP3=#Kdp3# and KDTANS=#Kdtans#
update ASET_KEMITRAAN set TGLVALID = NULL where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Nodokumen# and KDP3=#Kdp3# and KDTANS=#Kdtans#
update ASET_KEMITRAAN set REV_BY=#Rev_by# and REV_DATE=#Rev_date#
update ASET_KEMITRAAN set REV_BY='' and REV_DATE=null
statements.select: select A.ID, A.UNITKEY, D.KDUNIT, D.NMUNIT, A.NODOKUMEN, A.KDP3, D2.NMP3, D2.NMINST, A.KDTANS, J.NMTRANS, A.KDJENIS, JK.NMJENIS , A.TGLAWAL, A.TGLAKHIR, A.TGLVALID, A.NILAI, rtrim(A.IDDOKUMEN) IDDOKUMEN, rtrim(A.IDPENGAJUAN) IDPENGAJUAN, A.KET , rtrim(AK.IDDOKUMEN) as IDDOKUMENAWAL, AK.NODOKUMEN as NODOKUMENAWAL from ASET_KEMITRAAN A left join ASET_KEMITRAAN AK ON AK.UNITKEY = A.UNITKEY AND AK.IDDOKUMEN = A.IDDOKUMEN AND AK.KDJENIS = '01' AND AK.IDPENGAJUAN = 1 left join DAFTUNIT D ON D.UNITKEY = A.UNITKEY left join DAFTPHK3 D2 ON D2.KDP3 = A.KDP3 left join JTRANS J ON J.KDTANS = A.KDTANS left join JKONTRAK JK ON JK.KDJENIS = A.KDJENIS
where 1=1 and A.UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and A.KDTANS=#Kdtans# and A.KDJENIS=#Kdjenis#
where 1=1 and A.UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and A.KDTANS=#Kdtans# and A.KDJENIS='01'
where A.UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and A.NODOKUMEN=#Nodokumen# and A.KDP3=#Kdp3# and A.KDTANS=#Kdtans#
select cast(isnull(max(A.IDDOKUMEN),0)+1 as CHAR) IDDOKUMEN from ASET_KEMITRAAN A
select cast(isnull(max(A.IDPENGAJUAN),0)+1 as CHAR) IDPENGAJUAN from ASET_KEMITRAAN as A where A.UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and A.IDDOKUMEN=#Iddokumen#
select IDDOKUMEN as IDDOKUMENAWAL, NODOKUMEN as NODOKUMENAWAL from ASET_KEMITRAAN where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and IDDOKUMEN=#Iddokumen# and KDJENIS = '01' and IDPENGAJUAN = 1
select count(*) JMLDATA from ASET_KEMITRAANDET where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Nodokumen# and KDP3=#Kdp3# and KDTANS=#Kdtans#

select sum(x.NODOKUMEN) as JMLKIB from ( select count(NODOKUMEN) as NODOKUMEN from ASET_KIBADET where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Nodokumen# and KDTANS=#Kdtans# union all select count(NODOKUMEN) as NODOKUMEN from ASET_KIBBDET where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Nodokumen# and KDTANS=#Kdtans# union all select count(NODOKUMEN) as NODOKUMEN from ASET_KIBCDET where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Nodokumen# and KDTANS=#Kdtans# union all select count(NODOKUMEN) as NODOKUMEN from ASET_KIBDDET where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Nodokumen# and KDTANS=#Kdtans# union all select count(NODOKUMEN) as NODOKUMEN from ASET_KIBEDET where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Nodokumen# and KDTANS=#Kdtans# union all select count(NODOKUMEN) as NODOKUMEN from ASET_KIBGDET where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Nodokumen# and KDTANS=#Kdtans#) x
